Articles.Content:
So this little project of mine started out as a replica of Lockheed's entry to the JSF (joint strike fighter) competition. However, i wanted to keep it stock, so a revolving engine at the back like in the original would do, and just one engine at the back was too weak. Now its just a jet plane with kinda-VTOL capabilities. takeoff is ok, but landing is a nightmare.

if image is broken, go here:

http://imgur.com/j2TtmnY

before you ask, yes i did use to noclip for parts while making it. i needed it to make the VTOL jet engines

press 1 to toggle the VTOL engines, 2 for the main engines.

download:

http://www./download.php?u2p27fx38x9oe6y
That looks pretty nice.. I really like that.

That is a very nice looking plane. I swaped out the inline cockpit for a frontal one (to make ejecting the damn thing easier) and rebalanced a bit of things and she flies like a beauty- and looks wonderful too! Great work.

After testing this... yeah.. this is very nice.. It's a little bit front heavy, but easy to deal with.. really nice taking off vertically like this.. I really like this..

Taking off conventionally results in explosion xD
the best carrier fighter iv ever seen stops a few meters away going at 25
You saying "Carrier" has just made me think.... ohh my goodness how cool would it be if you could have a Carrier and you could land airplanes on it in this game..
